column1: #Text=Warden Poon says : " I bet you 're tired of being in this cell old man .
#Text=" Warden Poon says : " Careful , Ming , do n't get too close .
#Text=His stench will knock you right out .
#Text=" Ming says : " I snuck in some white jade tea .
#Text=Ever since I was put in here , you have been very kind to me .
